short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The extension makes Maynamar which is written with Zawgyi font readable.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are the letters not displayed correctly on your Facebook for Myanmar language? Use this extension to fix it.

- Changes 0.2
- The extension should be working again.
